headline: Peru Bets on Chevron and Riyadh to Jumpstart Its Energy Future
summary: Peru expects to sign in November an agreement with Saudi Arabia to develop lithium projects and other strategic minerals.

raw.headline: Peru Bets on Chevron and Riyadh to Jumpstart Its Energy Future
raw.summary: Peru expects to sign in November an agreement with Saudi Arabia to develop lithium projects and other strategic minerals.

headline: UPDATED: Chevron announces about 75 additional layoffs
summary: Chevron U.S.A. Inc. has notified local government officials it plans to lay off about 75 local employees in addition to the 52 workers it said it let go in July. A letter the division sent out Aug. 22 said the employees will come from its San Joaquin Valley headquarters at 9525 Camino Media and its Kern River Oil Field operation at 1526 China Grade Loop. It said the latest round of layoffs is ...
